Acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive

12.description: Determines a minimum temperature change value (insensitivity level; def: 0,5C)

13.description: Transmitting the alarm or control frame in 'broadcast' mode

options.label: Flood mode active, Tamper mode inactive
Tamper mode inactive, Tamper mode active
Flood and Tamper broadcast mode active

50.description: The parameter stores a temperature value, below which LED indicator blinks.

51.description: The parameter stores a temperature value, above which LED indicator blinks.

options.label: Button and movement tampers alarm active
